languages.text: "Порт Странник, Каликсис. Это врата в Коронус и монументальная станция, вечно облепленная кораблями и трещащая по швам от количества торгашей, паломников, наемников и преступников всех мастей. В сравнении с Портом Странник Футфол — безжизненный камень в пустоте".

"Port Wander, in Calixis. The gateway to the Expanse, a monumental station, always covered in ships and bursting at the seams from all the dealers, pilgrims, mercenaries, and criminals. Compared to Port Wander, Footfall is just a lifeless rock in the void."
languages.original_text: "Порт Странник, Каликсис. Это врата в Коронус и монументальная станция, вечно облепленная кораблями и трещащая по швам от количества торгашей, паломников, наемников и преступников всех мастей. В сравнении с Портом Странник Футфол — безжизненный камень в пустоте".

languages.text: 「キャリクシスのポート・ワンダーです。エクスパンスへの玄関口にして、巨大なステーションです。船がひしめき合い、商人、巡礼者、傭兵、そして犯罪者たちで常にあふれかえっています。ポート・ワンダーと比べれば、フットフォールなんてただの生命のない岩にすぎません」
languages.original_text: "Port Wander, in Calixis. The gateway to the Expanse, a monumental station, always covered in ships and bursting at the seams from all the dealers, pilgrims, mercenaries, and criminals. Compared to Port Wander, Footfall is just a lifeless rock in the void."

traits.locale_text: 「キャリクシスのポート・ワンダーです。エクスパンスへの玄関口にして、巨大なステーションです。船がひしめき合い、商人、巡礼者、傭兵、そして犯罪者たちで常にあふれかえっています。ポート・ワンダーと比べれば、フットフォールなんてただの生命のない岩にすぎません」

languages.text: "Aus Port Wander in Calixis. Das Tor zur Ausdehnung, eine gewaltige Station, immer voller Schiffe und Händler, Pilger, Söldner und Verbrecher. Platzt förmlich aus allen Nähten. Verglichen mit Port Wander ist Footfall ein unbelebter Stein in der Leere."
languages.original_text: "Port Wander, in Calixis. The gateway to the Expanse, a monumental station, always covered in ships and bursting at the seams from all the dealers, pilgrims, mercenaries, and criminals. Compared to Port Wander, Footfall is just a lifeless rock in the void."

traits.locale_text: "Aus Port Wander in Calixis. Das Tor zur Ausdehnung, eine gewaltige Station, immer voller Schiffe und Händler, Pilger, Söldner und Verbrecher. Platzt förmlich aus allen Nähten. Verglichen mit Port Wander ist Footfall ein unbelebter Stein in der Leere."

languages.text: « De Port l'Errance, dans le secteur Calixis. Il s'agit d'une station monumentale située aux portes des Étendues de Koronus, dont les ports accueillent constamment d'importants flux de vaisseaux ainsi que tous les marchands, pèlerins, mercenaires et criminels qui s'y rattachent. Castel n'est qu'un caillou désertique perdu au milieu du vide, par rapport à Port l'Errance.
languages.original_text: "Port Wander, in Calixis. The gateway to the Expanse, a monumental station, always covered in ships and bursting at the seams from all the dealers, pilgrims, mercenaries, and criminals. Compared to Port Wander, Footfall is just a lifeless rock in the void."

traits.locale_text: « De Port l'Errance, dans le secteur Calixis. Il s'agit d'une station monumentale située aux portes des Étendues de Koronus, dont les ports accueillent constamment d'importants flux de vaisseaux ainsi que tous les marchands, pèlerins, mercenaires et criminels qui s'y rattachent. Castel n'est qu'un caillou désertique perdu au milieu du vide, par rapport à Port l'Errance.

languages.text: «En Puerto Vagabundo, en el sector Calixis. La entrada a la Extensión, una estación espacial gigantesca que siempre está llena de naves fondeadas y donde se hacinan toda clase de comerciantes, peregrinos, mercenarios y criminales. Comparada con Puerto Vagabundo, Paso no es más que una roca despoblada flotando en el vacío».
languages.original_text: "Port Wander, in Calixis. The gateway to the Expanse, a monumental station, always covered in ships and bursting at the seams from all the dealers, pilgrims, mercenaries, and criminals. Compared to Port Wander, Footfall is just a lifeless rock in the void."

traits.locale_text: «En Puerto Vagabundo, en el sector Calixis. La entrada a la Extensión, una estación espacial gigantesca que siempre está llena de naves fondeadas y donde se hacinan toda clase de comerciantes, peregrinos, mercenarios y criminales. Comparada con Puerto Vagabundo, Paso no es más que una roca despoblada flotando en el vacío».

languages.text: “我来自卡利西斯星区的漫游港，那里是通往科罗努斯扩区的门户。那座星站熙熙攘攘，各种各样的舰船川流不息，到处都是商人、朝圣者、雇佣兵、罪犯。与漫游港相比，落脚港就像是虚空之中毫无生机的岩石一样。”
languages.original_text: "Port Wander, in Calixis. The gateway to the Expanse, a monumental station, always covered in ships and bursting at the seams from all the dealers, pilgrims, mercenaries, and criminals. Compared to Port Wander, Footfall is just a lifeless rock in the void."

traits.locale_text: “我来自卡利西斯星区的漫游港，那里是通往科罗努斯扩区的门户。那座星站熙熙攘攘，各种各样的舰船川流不息，到处都是商人、朝圣者、雇佣兵、罪犯。与漫游港相比，落脚港就像是虚空之中毫无生机的岩石一样。”

languages.text: "Calixis'teki Irak Limanlıyım. Enginlik'in geçidi, bir anıt istasyondur. Daima gemilerle kaplıdır ve satıcılar, seyyahlar, paralı askerler ve suçlularla dolup taşar. Irak Liman ile karşılaştırıldığında Binliman, boşlukta cansız bir kayadan ibarettir."
languages.original_text: "Port Wander, in Calixis. The gateway to the Expanse, a monumental station, always covered in ships and bursting at the seams from all the dealers, pilgrims, mercenaries, and criminals. Compared to Port Wander, Footfall is just a lifeless rock in the void."

traits.locale_text: "Calixis, Irak Limanlıyım. Enginlik'in geçidi, bir anıt istasyondur. Daima gemilerle kaplıdır ve satıcılar, seyyahlar, paralı askerler ve suçlularla dolup taşar. Irak Liman ile karşılaştırıldığında Binliman, boşlukta cansız bir kayadan ibaret."
